tasks.rendered_sql_preview:
--[TB_CONTRACT]
-- 계약 기본 정보 Export
SELECT
    CONTRACT_ID,
    CLS_YYMM,
    PRODUCT_CD,
    CUSTOMER_ID,
    CONTRACT_AMT,
    STATUS,
    TO_CHAR(REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DTM
FROM TB_CONTRACT
WHERE CLS_YYMM = :clsYymm
ORDER BY CONTRACT_ID

--[TB_PAYMENT]
-- 납입 내역 Export
SELECT
    PAYMENT_ID,
    CONTRACT_ID,
    CLS_YYMM,
    PAY_AMT,
    TO_CHAR(PAY_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PAY_DT,
    PAY_TYPE
FROM TB_PAYMENT
WHERE CLS_YYMM = :clsYymm
ORDER BY PAYMENT_ID
